005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
011
012import java.util.Objects;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * An abstract implementation of an atomic type backed by a data type adapter.
018 *
019 * @param <T>
020 *          the Java type of the item supported by the implementation
021 */
022public class DataTypeItemType<T extends IAnyAtomicItem>
023    extends AbstractAtomicOrUnionType<T> {
024  @NonNull
025  private final IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter;
026
027  /**
028   * Construct a new atomic type.
029   *
030   * @param adapter
031   *          the data type adapter supporting the item type
032   * @param itemClass
033   *          the item class this atomic type supports
034   * @param castExecutor
035   *          the executor used to cast an item to an item of this type
036   */
037  public DataTypeItemType(
038      @NonNull IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter,
039      @NonNull Class<T> itemClass,
040      @NonNull ICastExecutor<T> castExecutor) {
041    super(itemClass, castExecutor);
042    this.adapter = adapter;
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  @NonNull
047  public IDataTypeAdapter<?> getAdapter() {
048    return adapter;
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public IEnhancedQName getQName() {
053    return getAdapter().getPreferredName();
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public String toString() {
058    return toSignature();
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public int hashCode() {
063    return Objects.hash(adapter, getItemClass());
064  }
065
066  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
067  @Override
068  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
069    if (this == obj) {
070      return true;
071    }
072    if (!(obj instanceof DataTypeItemType)) {
073      return false;
074    }
075    DataTypeItemType<?> other = (DataTypeItemType<?>) obj;
076    return Objects.equals(getAdapter(), other.getAdapter())
077        && Objects.equals(getItemClass(), other.getItemClass());
078  }
079}
